nodes.text: A blaster thought to have been once owned by the Sith Lord Freedon Nadd said to have killed more Jedi than any lightsaber. The blaster was thought of as a "vile weapon".
In the game, in order to use the weapon, a character has to be aligned with the dark side and of a Sith prestige class (Sith Lord, Sith Assassin or Sith Marauder).
